content: this is an easy beginner shawl knitting pattern that uses one skein of yarn you can use any one of the yarns listed above or use 480 yards of a self-striping worsted weight yarn #4 weight by craft yarn council beginner diagonal shawl is knitted on the bias and is suitable for knitters of all skill levels there is a full step-by-step video tutorial available as well https //blog nobleknits com/blog/how-to-knit-a-triangle-shawl-for-beginners https //youtu be/jq-qqvlu6z0
